summary: The Block has assembled a timeline of OFAC sanctions on crypto wallets, settlements with crypto firms, and general guidance to crypto operators, going back to 2018.
title: A brief history of US crypto sanctions
content: Dates assembled by the author from publicly available government documents and announcements. Graphics designed by Zoe Ellyse Del Rosario.
